page.title: 06HIGGINS POTATO MERCHANTS
page.content: Higgins are a local{potato} {merchant}based in Finningley, who employ 56 people, but this number rises during harvest time. Approximately one third of this number are local people. The function of the company is agricultural, farming about {2000 acres}of local land around a{50} {mile radius,}where the potatoes are grown and collected with their own machinery. The merchant company covers about 200 acres including the offices which are equipped with modern computers. The{potatoes}are{stored} under{special conditions}including yellow lights and temperature control at the Green Bank Store. 20,000 tonnes of potatoes can be stored at Green Bank. The potatoes are transported in bulker lorries to{crisp manufacturers. Another of Higgins products are "Pommies" which are sized potatoes.
